story.headline: President Meets with Congress
story.synopsis: The President meet with Congressional leaders today in effort to jump-start faltering budget negotiations. Sources described the mood of the meeting as "cordial".

story.headline: Relief Agencies head to Peru
story.synopsis: Relief agencies headed to Peru today in wake of yesterday's massive earthquake. Initial casualty estimates top 8000, in what would be one of the most devasting earthquakes in the last 5 years.

story.headline: Congress Approves Judicial Nominee
story.synopsis: By a vote of 55-42, the Senate approved controversial judge Sandra Lehman to the bench of the third circuit court.

story.headline: Bucks grab Series Lead
story.synopsis: Last night, the Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Los Angles Lakers to take a 3-2 lead in the NBA finals. The series returns to Los Angeles tomorrow night, where the Lakers have been undefeated in the playoffs.

story.headline: "The Witness" tops Box Office
story.synopsis: "The Witness" was the top-ranked movie this week with 18M in sales. Last week's box champ, "Another Life", fell to second with 11M in sales.
